Description:
Required Skills to be successful:-A Bachelor’s degree/Master’s Degree in any Discipline.
Relevant experience in Product Management in Consumer Durables/FMCG.
Excellent negotiation skills.
Conversant with competition analysis and benchmarking.
Excellent data and trend Analysis.
Proficiency in Microsoft Office Tools-Word/Excel/PowerPoint etc
Gulf experience with valid Omani driving license preferred.What equips you for the role:Bachelor Degree (Mastered Preferred) Post Graduate Diploma/Degree in Marketing/Business Administration can apply.
5-10 years’ experience handling similar position preferably in consumer electronics industry.
Accountability
Presentation skills
Analytical skills
Interpersonal skills
Problem solving
Proven ability to achieve goals.Job Details
